name: Niya-Atha Sorcerer
description: A Medium Fey with a blend of magic and physical prowess, characterized by ice-themed abilities and a resilient constitution.
memorable: Can summon an iceberg to hinder and damage multiple foes at once.
goals: Uses its magic to control the battlefield and mitigate threats with cold damage.
relations: Might ally with other fey creatures or ice-themed beings.
environment: Likely found in cold or enchanted areas.
strengths: Possesses cold damage resistance and can deal substantial damage with ice magic.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage due to reliance on cold-based effects.
attacks: Employs melee strikes with a scepter and ranged attacks using ice shards.
most_powerful_ability: Summon Iceberg, which can restrain opponents and deal significant damage.
equipment: Wields a scepter that enhances its melee attacks.
skills: Proficient in Intelligence and Wisdom saving throws, indicating a good defense against mental effects.
additional_information: Gains advantage on Strength checks and saving throws when enlarged.
Can revert to normal size without expending an action.
Can deal significant damage at range with Ice Shard.
Increased Armor Class when enlarged, strategic for survivability.
Ability to manipulate its size adds versatility to combat tactics.
spellcasting: Utilizes ice-themed spells for direct damage and battlefield control.
